paper_title.en: An attempt at a reconstruction of psychology of the handicapped-through a study on"handicap concept"

description.ja: In order to revive psychology of the handicapped, an investigation into "handicap concept" was carried out. Through methodologically comparative study between factually objective "handicap concept" and experiencedly subjective one, an empirical phenomenological view-point, from which the latter subjective "handicap concept" seems to originate, seems to become effective for changing to healthy concept, because person lives in such subjective life world as follows: handicap is darkness that serves as background against which we see the light.
